trans-unit.source: Specifies the dimensions of the margins of a printed page.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as dimensões das margens de uma página impressa.

trans-unit.source: The Margins class is used to manipulate the width of margins in <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de margens é usada para manipular a largura das margens e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings> <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter> is the type descriptor for this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter>é o descritor de tipo para esta classe.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.MarginsConverter>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom%2A> are properties that define the margins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom%2A>são propriedades que definem as margens.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Clone%2A> creates an identical Margins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Clone%2A>cria um margens idênticos.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%2A> determines if another object has the same dimensions as a Margins.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%2A>Determina se o outro objeto tem as mesmas dimensões como um margens.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Equals%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Visão geral do namespace.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> class with 1-inch wide margins.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> classe com margens largas 1 polegada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> class with the specified left, right, top, and bottom margins.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> classe com especificado à esquerda, direita, superior, margens e inferior.

trans-unit.source: The left margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem esquerda, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The right margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem direita, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The top margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem superior, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem inferior, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The left parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: O left o valor do parâmetro é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The right parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - right o valor do parâmetro é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The top parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - top o valor do parâmetro é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: -or- The bottom parameter value is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: - ou - bottom o valor do parâmetro é menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a margem inferior, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se você medir as margens em milímetros, multiplicar a largura da margem desejada em milímetros por 3.937 para determinar a medida correta em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser que uma margem de 25mm, multiplique por 3.937 e o resultado é 98 quando arredondado para baixo.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, defina as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>membro 98.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>

trans-unit.source: The bottom margin, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A margem inferior, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The Bottom property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade inferior é definida como um valor menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a duplicate of this object, member by member.
trans-unit.target: Recupera uma cópia deste objeto, membro por membro.

trans-unit.source: A duplicate of this object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cópia deste objeto.

trans-unit.source: Compares this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to the specified <xref:System.Object> to determine whether they have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Compara este <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> especificado <xref:System.Object>para determinar se eles têm as mesmas dimensões.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The object to which to compare this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto ao qual comparar isso <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified object is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> and has the same <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right*> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left*> values as this <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o objeto especificado for um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> e tem o mesmo <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *> e <> </> *> valores este <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calculates and retrieves a hash code based on the width of the left, right, top, and bottom margins.
trans-unit.target: Calcula e recupera um código de hash com base na largura da esquerda, direita, superior e margens inferior.

trans-unit.source: A hash code based on the left, right, top, and bottom margins.
trans-unit.target: Um código de hash com base na esquerda, direita, superior e margens inferior.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the left margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da margem esquerda, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se você medir as margens em milímetros, multiplicar a largura da margem desejada em milímetros por 3.937 para determinar a medida correta em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser que uma margem de 25mm, multiplique por 3.937 e o resultado é 98 quando arredondado para baixo.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, defina as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>membro 98.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>

trans-unit.source: The left margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A largura da margem esquerda, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The Left property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade esquerda é definida como um valor menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to determine if they have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> para determinar se eles tiverem as mesmas dimensões.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> para comparação de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> para comparação de igualdade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top*>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom*> properties of both margins have the same value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar o <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *> propriedades de margens têm o mesmo valor; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to determine whether they are of unequal width.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> para determinar se eles são de larguras desiguais.

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: A primeira <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> para comparação de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to compare for inequality.
trans-unit.target: A segunda <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> para comparação de desigualdade.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate if the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Left*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Right*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Top*>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins.Bottom*> properties of both margins are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para indicar se o <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, ou <> </> *> propriedades de margens não forem iguais; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the right margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da margem direita, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine the correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se você medir as margens em milímetros, multiplicar a largura da margem desejada em milímetros por 3.937 para determinar a medida correta em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser que uma margem de 25mm, multiplicar 3.937 e o resultado é 98 arredondado para baixo.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, defina as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>membro 98.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>

trans-unit.source: The right margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A largura da margem direita, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The Right property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade à direita é definida como um valor menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the top margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura da margem superior, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: If you measure margins in millimeters, multiply the margin width you want in millimeters by 3.937 to determine correct measurement in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: Se você medir as margens em milímetros, multiplicar a largura da margem desejada em milímetros por 3.937 para determinar medida correta em centésimos de polegada.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want a margin of 25mm, multiply by 3.937 and the result is 98 when rounded down.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser que uma margem de 25mm, multiplique por 3.937 e o resultado é 98 quando arredondado para baixo.

trans-unit.source: You would then set the appropriate <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins> member to 98.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, defina as <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>membro 98.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.Margins>

trans-unit.source: The top margin width, in hundredths of an inch.
trans-unit.target: A largura da margem superior, em centenas de polegada.

trans-unit.source: The Top property is set to a value that is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Top é definida como um valor menor que 0.

trans-unit.source: Converts the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref> to a string.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref> para uma cadeia de caracteres.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representation of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>representação do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.Margins"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>
